sentence.Network_en: Last year four ministers visited the Shinto shrine on August 15.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年四名部长在8月15日前往神道教神社.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 神道教（shinto）(Shinto)简称神教，是日本的传统民族宗教，最初以自然崇明治维新后日本政府为了巩固王权，将神道教（shinto）继续尊为国教，是为国 …

entry.tran: 神道教(日本的传统宗教)
entry.def: Shinto is the traditional religion of Japan.

means.word_mean: 1. the native religion and former ethnic cult of Japan
2. the ancient indigenous religion of Japan lacking formal dogma; characterized by a veneration of nature spirits and of ancestors
1. relating to or characteristic of Shintoism;
